person.persName: Lewis H. Ball (Madison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County native. Son of C. C. Ball and Emily Ball. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Signed letter to Governor Beriah Magoffin on March 11, 1861 stating intention to serve in a militia company from Richmond, Kentucky.
